{"id":578232391,"lang":"cpp","time":"10Â months","timestamp":1635373749,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"0 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/578232391/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Pow(x, n)","memory":"5.8 MB","code":"typedef long long int ll;\nclass Solution {\npublic:\n    double fastpow(double x ,ll N){\n        if(N ==0){\n            return 1.0;\n        }\n        double half = fastpow(x ,N/2);\n        if(N%2 ==0){\n            return half*half;\n        }\n        else{\n            return half*half*x;\n        }\n    }\n    \n    double myPow(double x, int n) {\n        ll N= n ;\n        if(N <0){\n            N = -N;\n            x = 1/x;\n        }\n        return fastpow(x,N);\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"powx-n"}
